body.name: Blackview Tab 70 WiFi 2024 Android 13 Tablet, 8(4+4) GB+64GB 1TB Expand, Wi-Fi 6 Model, 10.1 inch Tablet with HD+IPS Display, 6580mAh, Dual Speakers and Camera, BT5.0, Google GMS, 2.0GHz CPU, Gray
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 52 mins
features: 🚀[Android 13 Tablet + Doke OS_P 3.0] Blackview Tab 70WiFi is equipped with the latest Android 13 in 2024, with stronger privacy protection and access control. More than that, the self-developed Doke OS user desktop has more practical functions, such as screen recording, split screen, and intelligent power saving, to help you work efficiently and have fun.

✨[8GB + 64GB + 1TB TF] Blackview Android 13 tablet has up to 8GB RAM (4GB real memory + 4GB virtual memory), equipped with 2.0GHz low-power CPU, with enough smoothness to quickly run multiple applications and execute Multiple tasks. Equipped with 64GB ROM and MicroSD card slot (expandable to 1TB), you can store more of your favorite apps and content.

📶[Stable Connection, Feel Immersive] Tab70WiFi tablet uses advanced Bluetooth 5.0 technology to provide faster transmission speed, stronger connection stability and longer Bluetooth range (up to 12m). The smart K7 dual speakers can actively adjust according to the sound effects you set, and you can feel Immersive stereo sound.

🔋[6580mAh Long-lasting Battery] Say goodbye to frequent charging. The Blackview tablet is equipped with a large 6580mAh battery, which can achieve 6-7 hours of video playback in just 2 hours of charging. Paired with a 10W fast charger, you don't have to worry about running out of power even during long periods of study and entertainment.

💖[WiFi6 + 720-Days Warranty] The 10.1-inch tablet Tab 70WiFi is a tri-band WiFi tablet that supports WiFi 2.4GHz, WiFi 5GHz high frequency, WiFi 5GHz low frequency, and the maximum network speed can reach 400Mbps. 🎀720-day worry-free warranty and 24-hour customer service. If you have any questions, please contact us on the Amazon order page, we offer free replacements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Budget-Friendly Tablet with Impressive Features! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the Blackview Tab 8, and I must say, it has exceeded all my expectations. This tablet is a true gem, offering a perfect blend of performance, functionality, and affordability.The RK3566 Quad-core chip ensures smooth and lag-free operation, making it a fantastic choice for gaming enthusiasts. The 10.1-inch display provides a vibrant and immersive experience, making it ideal for both gaming and casual tablet use.The standout feature for me is the 6580mAh battery. It lasts an incredibly long time. Like longer than expected. Feel free to use the tablet throughout the day without worrying about constantly recharging. It's great for anyone who values a reliable and long-lasting device.The camera quality is impressive as well, with an 8MP front camera and a 13MP rear camera. It's perfect for capturing memorable moments, whether it's a family gathering or a scenic view. The Android 12 operating system adds a modern touch, providing a seamless and user-friendly interface.The great speakers further enhance the multimedia experience, whether I'm watching videos, playing games, or having FaceTime conversations. But in all honesty, the inclusion of a 3.5mm jack is a thoughtful touch, allowing me to use my favorite wired headphones without any adapters. Seems like most devices forget about this in 2024- shouts out Blackview.I highly recommend the Blackview Tab 8 to anyone looking for a reliable, budget-friendly tablet with top-notch features. It's an excellent gift for keeping a child entertained with games or for anyone seeking a versatile and capable tablet without breaking the bank. It's not just a budget-friendly device; it's a budget-friendly device with all the bells and whistles! This device has truly won me over, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddlers love it. Glad I bought it.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Tab 70 WiFi 2024 Android 13 Tablet, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! This tablet truly exceeded my expectations in every aspect.Firstly, the 10.1-inch HD+IPS display is stunning, providing crisp and vibrant visuals for all my multimedia needs. Whether I'm streaming videos, playing games, or browsing the web, the clarity and color reproduction are impressive.The storage options are fantastic, with 8GB RAM (4+4) and 64GB internal storage, expandable up to a whopping 1TB. This ensures that I have more than enough space for all my apps, photos, and files. The 2.0GHz CPU ensures smooth and lag-free performance, even during multitasking or resource-intensive applications.The Wi-Fi 6 capability is a game-changer, offering fast and reliable connectivity. It's a joy to browse the internet, stream content, and download files seamlessly. The 6580mAh battery provides ample power, ensuring that I can use the tablet for extended periods without constantly worrying about charging.The dual speakers deliver excellent audio quality, enhancing my entertainment experience. Additionally, the dual cameras are handy for capturing moments on the go.I appreciate the inclusion of Bluetooth 5.0 and Google GMS, adding to the overall versatility of the tablet. The sleek gray design adds a touch of sophistication to the device.In conclusion, the Tab 70 WiFi 2024 Android 13 Tablet is a fantastic investment for anyone in need of a reliable and feature-packed device. It offers a perfect blend of performance, storage, connectivity, and multimedia capabilities. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for :)
reviews.reviewText: I love this tablet. It’s the perfect size and it has plenty of storage space. I’ve had no issues with lagging or freezing etc. Also, it takes great photos. The battery lasts for hours so it’s perfect for me to stick in my bag before I go somewhere. Overall, I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great buy! I’m impressed by the functionality and speed. It seems to hold a charge well.We contemplated getting a Chromebook for our son for streaming and school research. I am so happy we went with this tablet instead. It’s lightweight and sleek, but sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for kids and the price is cheap
reviews.reviewText: I brought this for my son , since my old samsung tab that i got 8b years ago has no more updates andnitbis just dead. Knowing that they update OS why spend lot of money and buys a branded item. Instead i went with this and it is good for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect tablet
reviews.reviewText: I love this tablet! It’s a great size not too big and not too small. Has all the functions I needed in a tablet and the battery lasts a very long time! Can’t beat the price either.

reviews.reviewText: Good features and configurations.Charges fast and good size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for seniors
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my mother, who already knows how to use an android phone. Was a seamless transition for her. Was a breeze to set up, and she enjoys being able to use all of her normal apps on a much larger screen. Very light weight and battery life is wonderful.
